name: Super Normal Cars
description:
Take control of 1 of 5 cool cars and put your skills to the test in 3 wacky courses!

  • Wasd or arrow keys to turn, accelerate and brake/reverse
  • Ctrl / Left Click to accelarate
  • Right click to brake/reverse
  • Space to use Items
  • F to toggle fullscreen

Mac and Linux builds are untested.
